mapper.select: select rownum num, A.* from (select * from n_board order by nnum desc) A where rownum < 4
select * from (select rownum num, A.* from (select * from n_board order by nnum desc) A where rownum <= ${param2}) B where B.num >= ${param1}
mapper.insert: update n_board set nhit = nhit + 1 where nnum = #{nnum}
insert into n_board (nNum, nTitle, nContent, nName, ndate, nhit, nfroot) values (n_board_seq.nextval, #{ntitle}, #{ncontent}, #{nname}, sysdate, 0, #{nfroot, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
